Package kchandra423.utility

Class AssetLoader

java.lang.Object
kchandra423.utility.AssetLoader
public class AssetLoader extends Object
Loads all assets needed initially and held statically. This is to prevent the need to do this throughout runtime, which is extremely time consuming. Returns clones of these so as to not have to recalculate, but also be safe to use as separate objects.
Author:
Kumar Chandra

  • Method Details

    • getImage

      public static KImage getImage​(int index)
      Gets a clone of the KImage at the given index. All indexes are specified as a constant. For example, to get a Bat attack sprite, you would call getImage(BAT_ATTACK);
      Parameters:
      index - The index of which image you want
      Returns:
      A clone of the original image.
